statements.select: SELECT ISNULL(VisitorID,0) FROM VISITOR WHERE VisitorName = #VisitorName# AND Mobile = #VisitorMobile#
SELECT A.VisitorID, B.VisitorName, B.Company FROM VisitorHistory A, VIsitor B WHERE A.VisitorID = B.VisitorID AND VisitorHistorySeq = #VisitorHistorySeq#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO VISITOR (VisitorName, Mobile, Company, LastVisitDate) VALUES (#VisitorName# ,#VisitorMobile# , #VisitorCompany# , #VisitDateTime#)
select @@IDENTITY as VisitorID
INSERT INTO VISITORHISTORY (VisitorID, AgreeFirst, AgreeSecond, SignPath, VisitDate, HostID) VALUES (#VisitorID#,#AgreeFirstFlag#,#AgreeSecondFlag#,#SignPath#, #VisitDateTime#, #HostID#)
statements.update: UPDATE VISITOR SET LastVisitDate = #VisitDateTime# WHERE VisitorID = #VisitorID#
UPDATE VISITORHISTORY SET AgreeFirst = #AgreeFirstFlag#, AgreeSecond = #AgreeSecondFlag#, SignPath = #SignPath#, VisitDate = #VisitDateTime# WHERE VisitorHistorySeq = #VisitorHistorySeq#
statements.select: SELECT ISNULL(HostID,0) FROM Host WHERE HostName = #HostName# AND Company = #HostCompany#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO HOST (HostName, Company, InsertDate) VALUES (#HostName#, #HostCompany#, GetDate())
select @@IDENTITY as HostID
